title: 21st Amendment : SLFP, Group of 10, SLPP Independents submit their draft to speaker
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Sri Lanka Freedom Party, the Group of 10 parties, and the Independent MPs from the SLPP handed over their draft for the proposed 21st Amendment to the Constitution on Friday (21) to the speaker.
